pageContent: 1   |   P a g e  Work Instruction  Accessing Jenzabar with AD Authentication  PURPOSE  This work instruction provides   instruction on how J1 Desktop   Active Directory   authentication   functions .  PRECONDITIONS  The user must have a Jenzabar account.  LOGGING IN  When the user clicks   on the   J1 Desktop icon from the RDS web (or shortcut from your home   scr een),   the window below  will pop - up   once . The user should choose J1 Desktop   from   the   Database drop - down (if it is not already s elected) and  click OK.  *** After this ini tial login with AD Authentication, the user wil l no longer see the prompt screen. When   the J1 Desktop  app is clicked, the   application will   automatically open.  END OF WORK INSTRUCTION
